name: CSS Slidy Magento Module
body:
### What is it
Pure CSS3 Slider for Magento. The simplest and fastest and most hassle-free thing ever.

### How to use it
Copy the module files into your file system.  
Upload images of equal size into media/cssslidy/slider  
Display CSS Slider on Magento CMS pages: `{{block type="CSSSlidy_Slider/render"}}`  
  
More info in [README](https://github.com/mthjn/CSSSlidyMagentoModule/blob/master/README.md)  
Tested on Magento 1.9  

#### A massive gif:
![CSS Slider](http://haircare.berlin/img/CSSSlidyMagento.gif)
([Or link to the massive GIF](http://haircare.berlin/img/CSSSlidyMagento.gif))
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
